hours: We are open Mon-Sun from 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM.
location: We are located at 123 Food Street, Tech City.
halal: Yes, all our meat is 100% Halal certified.
delivery: We offer delivery via UberEats, DoorDash, and our website.
reservation: You can book a table by calling us at 555-0123.
vegetarian: Yes, we have a wide selection of vegetarian options marked on the menu.
